name: Ancient Resonance
overrideDescription: Deal [trait0.power] damage to enemy units per [corrupt].

additionalTooltips.title: Charged Echoes
additionalTooltips.description:
Add [corrupt] by playing [infused] cards. The Wurmkin use [corrupt] to power spells and abilities.

[corrupt] can exceed [emptycorrupt] but excess [corrupt] will be removed at end of turn.

cardLoreTooltips: I could not Judge anymore, the simple scale laid out by the Divines too reductive for my beliefs. Souls are complicated, morally ambiguous beings. Hell and Heaven arenâ€™t that different, each one having its faults, but also having its wonderful beauties. I am not proud of what I did, nor what came after. The only solace is that, at the time, I believed it to be right, and without that conviction we are all lost. Though, I doubt Seraph will see it the same way.
